{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Vera3 Advanced Smart Home Controller |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://getvera.com/controllers/vera3/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Mi Casa Verde |model = Vera |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = home monitoring gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = P27NA900A |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = AAP00A-1.6 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3662F; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ST Micro;NAND256W3A2BN6; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT6TU64M16GG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8236; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0E:8F |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot Version: 3.4.0.4; |stockos = Linux;2.6.37.1;OpenWrt 10.03;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600 8N1),, P1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Z-Wave, RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = 2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS54325;;1;,,, 3A, 18V, 340KHz Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1484;;1;,,, Z-Wave Chip;Sigma Designs (Zensys);ZW0301;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = NA900 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/12/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0074WIVJ4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AAP00A-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board and "YN400NOB-1.6" is silkscreened on the Z-Wave daughterboard which contains the ZW0301 chip.
==See also== :;Vera Control • [https://z-wave.su/ru/blog/obzor-kontrollera-vera-secure Secure] *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera2]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM5354 • [[Sigma Designs]] Z-Wave *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera3]] • [[Ralink]] CPU @500MHz; Memory: 32MB/128MB <!-- :DDR2 RAM, USB ports: 2; Ethernet ports: 1 WAN, 4 LAN; Z-Wave and Wireless-N Wi-Fi (802.11n) --> *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera Edge]] • CPU @600MHz (MIPS) • Memory: 128MB/128MB *[[Mi Casa Verde VeraLite]] (G) • [[Ralink]] RT3662 • Memory: 32MB/64MB, Zensys Z-Wave *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera Plus]] • [[MediaTek]] MT7621S • Memory: 128MB/256MB, Z-Wave+, ZigBee *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera Secure]] • [[MediaTek]] MT7621A • Memory: 128MB/512MB, VeraLink <!-- Vera Edge Vera Plus Vera Secure
CPU SoC 600MHz MIPS 880MHz MIPS 880MHz Dual-Core MIPS Flash NAND 128MB NAND 128MB NAND 128MB RAM DDR2 128MB DDR3 256MB DDR3 512MB Z-wave Z-wave Plus Z-wave Plus Z-wave Plus ZigBee - HA 1.2 HA 1.2 Bluetooth - 4.0 + BLE 4.0 + BLE Wi-Fi 802.11bgn 802.11abgn/ac 802.11abgn/ac VeraLink - - 345MHz (US)/433MHz (EU) -->
